fulltext:
Hung Vo Anh
� anhhung1303@gmail.com
� anhhung1303
� +84 969 031 303
EDUCATION
Vietnam National University, Hanoi
GPA: 3.27/4
Bachelor of Computer Science
Sep 2011 - June 2015
KEY SKILLS
C++, Python, Data Structure and Algorithm, Shell script, Git, Vim.
WORK EXPERIENCE
Coc Coc Advertising Engine
Hanoi, Vietnam
C++ Developer
May 2017 - Present
○ Take part in develop Advertising Engine, which do thousands of realtime bidding auctions per second.
○ Develop keyword matching algorithm that match user’s query with advert’s keywords.
○ Research and develop click-through rate prediction, which is probability of ad click. This one should be
important as it is one of main factor decide which position an ad should be placed.
○ Implement ranking algorithm for contextual adverts - which are displayed on top of search engine result
page.
○ Develop and maintain adverts spending distribution service, which calculate/distribute user budget in
realtime. Including ad delivery spending mechanism, predict future spending, fast stop in case campaign
nearly running out of budget, etc.
○ Develop and maintain keyword provider service, which do tokenization and provides keyword’s tokens for
adverts.
○ Implementing statistic handling and storage using clickhouse database.
○ Usage technologies: C++14, Debian package, Clickhouse, Redis, TCP socket, etc.
Viettel Group
Hanoi, Vietnam
Software Engineer
Mar 2016 - Apr 2017
○ Take part in develop Viettel 4G LTE Base Station.
○ Develop OAM module, that manage a whole station, communicate with other LTE stack layer, e.g L2, L3 to
make eNodeB work functionaly, and to conﬁgure LTE parameters.
○ Operation Remote Radio Unit, allow operator to set LTE bandwidth, output power, Antenna tilt.
○ Realtime monitoring Radio Resource using TCP socket. Develop an agent module allow OAM module
communicate with EMS (Element Management System), which manage many eNodeBs.
○ Main laguage: C.
Sun*
Hanoi, Vietnam
Ruby on Rails Developer
Sep 2014 - Sep 2015
○ Develop web applications using Ruby on Rails framework.
ACADEMIC PROJECTS
Student Scientiﬁc Research and Thesis
2013 - 2015
○ Research the mechanism of Preemption delay to the process set response time in hard realtime system.
○ Research algorithm to optimize CPU scheduling in ﬂoating deferred preemption model.
3D Billiards Game
2013
○ Creating 3D billiards Game using OpenGL.
○ Write handlers when transform camera through space.
○ Write handlers that handle balls collisions.
○ Programming Language: OpenGL, C++.
3D image processing
2013
○ Process 3D image to make it better display on 3D viewer.
○ Implement ghost reduction algorithm to make 3D image display on viewer like real.
○ Language: Python.
Lecture Management
2014
○ Write a web application to manage Lectures and Quizzes.
○ Implement web app using MVC model.
○ Progamming Language: Python, Django framework.
Teris Game
2014
○ Write a small game called Tetris.
○ Write an AI tool that auto play Game with the highest score.
○ Programming Language: Java.
Adaptive Bitrate Streaming
2015
○ Building a streaming server that automatically adjust video resolution based on user network.
○ Write code to detect user network changes.
○ Develop algorithm to optimize video compression ratio based on diﬀerent kinds of videos.
○ Writing tool auto-encode original video into other resolutions using H264, Avisynth, ﬀmpeg.
○ Writing tool to download video from rtmp server using rtmp dump.
○ Programming Language: C++, Avisynth script, Action Script.
○ Having experience with video encoding.
AWARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
○ VietSeeds Foundation Schoolarship.
○ Academic Encourage Scholarships, given by University of Engineering and Technology, Vietnam National
University Hanoi.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
○ Take part in develop Advertising Engine, which do thousands of realtime bidding auctions per second.
○ Develop keyword matching algorithm that match user’s query with advert’s keywords.
○ Research and develop click-through rate prediction, which is probability of ad click. This one should be important as it is one of main factor decide which position an ad should be placed.
○ Implement ranking algorithm for contextual adverts - which are displayed on top of search engine result page.
○ Develop and maintain adverts spending distribution service, which calculate/distribute user budget in realtime. Including ad delivery spending mechanism, predict future spending, fast stop in case campaign nearly running out of budget, etc.
○ Develop and maintain keyword provider service, which do tokenization and provides keyword’s tokens for adverts.
○ Implementing statistic handling and storage using clickhouse database.
○ Usage technologies: C++14, Debian package, Clickhouse, Redis, TCP socket, etc.

○ Take part in develop Viettel 4G LTE Base Station. ○ Develop OAM module, that manage a whole station, communicate with other LTE stack layer, e.g L2, L3 to make eNodeB work functionaly, and to configure LTE parameters.
○ Operation Remote Radio Unit, allow operator to set LTE bandwidth, output power, Antenna tilt.
○ Realtime monitoring Radio Resource using TCP socket. Develop an agent module allow OAM module communicate with EMS (Element Management System), which manage many eNodeBs. ○ Main laguage: C.
○ Develop web applications using Ruby on Rails framework.

○ Research the mechanism of Preemption delay to the process set response time in hard realtime system.
○ Research algorithm to optimize CPU scheduling in floating deferred preemption model.

○ Write a web application to manage Lectures and Quizzes. ○ Implement web app using MVC model.
○ Progamming Language: Python, Django framework.
Teris Game 2014 ○ Write a small game called Tetris. ○ Write an AI tool that auto play Game with the highest score.
○ Programming Language: Java. Adaptive Bitrate Streaming 2015 ○ Building a streaming server that automatically adjust video resolution based on user network.
○ Write code to detect user network changes.
○ Develop algorithm to optimize video compression ratio based on different kinds of videos.
○ Writing tool auto-encode original video into other resolutions using H264, Avisynth, ffmpeg.
